storyInfo: The silent saint picks up the broken and burned flower.

attributes.content: Look here, Holst!
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: You've got to hand it to Clément. He really planted the flowers in front of the statue, prettier than anywhere else.
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: I'm surprised Stefano was okay with it, digging a hole in the sacrarium floor, searching for the right dirt, all that.
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: Take it easy. You're injured.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: It's just a little scratch.
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: Even little scratches can get worse.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: And call me Gerald.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Alright, alright. You're starting to nag like Stefano.
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: That's why his face is all wrinkly. Don't end up like him.
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: Worry less, meddle less. That's the key to a long life.
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: Don't say that. Stefano wants the best for the abbey.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: It's thanks to him that we get to live here.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I know, I'm just saying he worries too much.
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: I'm afraid it'll become too much for him.
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: Stefano is considered stubborn, even amongst the Sankta. He won't budge on what he thinks is right.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: But that's one of the reasons we've found refuge here.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: He says the Sarkaz are just like other people.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: And he's right.
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: Well, you and I, we'll have his back if things become too much for him. We'll repay our debt.
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: And stop thinking about what happened in the past. We turned our backs on Theresa when we left Kazdel. We can't go back, Gerald.
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: Neither of us can.
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: ...I know.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: You don't need to remind me.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I don't remember when I stopped believing in Her Highness's vision... I couldn't see the future of the Sarkaz in our two rulers.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: It's okay.
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: I'm fine. We have a new life now.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I led those who wanted to leave away from Kazdel. I'll take responsibility.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Life is much better than it used to be.
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: Be careful. We don't have the same resources we did before, and there are some tough customers among those bandits.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Aren't you being a little too careful?
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: How long will it take for the infamous mercenary to become a humble hunter out in the middle of nowhere? Five? Ten? Hahaha!
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: ...Gerald.
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Have you really thought about what you'll look like when you put down your weapons for real, and settle in as a humble hunter?
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: What will I look like?
attributes.name: Eileen

attributes.content: No, I've never thought about it.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: What will I look like...?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: You'll see for yourself, Eileen.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: A long time ago, Gerald used to look up at the night sky when he needed a breather after killing.
The sky is an oppressive black. The campfire has gone out, and even the embers have cooled.
Bloodied mercenaries wipe away the dirt from their faces, gazing at their equally battered comrades, briefly pondering questions they hardly have the luxury to think about.
Can Sarkaz like them truly hope for a happy life?
He once believed that the day would come when the Sarkaz rebuilt their home, but he feels more helpless with each passing day.
They have shed too much blood. They will run out of blood before their monarch's vision comes true.
Eventually, Gerald abandoned Kazdel, bringing along those gasping for breath, running from the land they once fought to the death for.
They hid from the world, ultimately finding a place that would take them. All they wanted was a normal, peaceful life.
The dream came true, once.
When did life turn bitter and oppressive?
It is like a fine dish on the table that no one has tasted.
It has gone bad through no one's doing.
If only blood can end this all...
Then there is only one thing left to do.
Don't bother trying to change my mind, Clément.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I can't go, and I won't go.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I never told you my old name. It's not a past I'm proud of. An infamous deserter, a broken man.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: With me here, they have an excuse to harm the others.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Don't be so sad. I'm just going to see Eileen. Death is familiar enough to me, I used to trade in death.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: My life is a small price to pay for the lives of all the others.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: And don't worry about the ones left behind. They'll follow my order.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Raimund is young. He might be impetuous. Do try to calm him down, won't you?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Finally...
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Tell Stefano that we probably shouldn't have stopped, back when we were wandering the wastes. Maybe we shouldn't have tried to stay.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: But this place was too good.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: It was like a dream, living together for so many years. Sooner or later, though, we all have to wake up.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Tell Stefano... gratias, and me paenitet.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I'll leave the rest to you, Clément.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Here, at the end of it all...
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Am I a hunter, or am I still that mercenary?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Eileen. I don't suppose you'd like what I've become, what I look like now.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: ...Dawn has broken.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: It seemed like a lot has happened, but then it also seemed like it all happened in the blink of an eye.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: It was a long night, wasn't it?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: What are you doing?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Nothing worthy of your time, Senior Federico.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I just wanted to find a flower. Gerald shouldn't go to see Eileen empty-handed.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: But it looks like the fire last night burned everything. There's nothing left.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: If it's just a flower you want, you wouldn't need to come here.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You don't understand, Senior Federico. It's not the same.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: The flowers here were different. A special breed grown only in this monastery.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: They represent friendship and hope.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Yes, friendship and hope. The abbot told me they were a symbol of Laterano's partnership with Iberia, one of the abbey's most important possessions.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Beautiful. I was struck, immediately.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: There used to be flowerbeds all over the abbey, covering every inch when you looked down from the bell tower during bloom season.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Eileen loved the sight of it. So did Gerald.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Many were scared to talk to the Sarkaz. But they got along a lot better after the first bloom season.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: People realized that the cruel and warlike Sarkaz would stop to take a look when they passed by the flowerbeds. They would take a flower or two to put in their homes.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: They weren't fearsome desperados. They were no different from us.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: There is one here.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Ah, you mean the one beneath the statue.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I saw it. It was lucky to lie beneath the statue when it fell.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: But it's not the one I wanted.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Look at it. Don't you see?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: It may have hid itself beneath the statue, but its stem is broken, and its petals are burned.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: But it's still here.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Is it?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I used to believe there were things that would survive, no matter the adversity. You may laugh, but I truly did.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Life wasn't easy, but all was good.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Amita Nina would make snacks for the kids when she has the time.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Have you ever heard of herb pizzelle?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Amita Nina and Hyman made them from a Lateran recipe using Sarkaz herbs. A dessert that everyone loved, one that belonged to this abbey, and this abbey alone.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Amita Nina used to say that tasting bitter fruit is all well and good, but the children should grow up knowing more than bitterness.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: They should know what sweetness tastes like.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I will commit this dessert to memory.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Ha. It's not important. We forgot the taste of sweetness a long time ago.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: No one makes pizzelle anymore.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I find myself curious at times.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: If Sankta weren't so special, if everyone in Laterano was mundane, normal, insignificant as I am...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Would the Holy City still look the same?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Would Laterano be Laterano?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: ...I don't know.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: That's a shame.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Clément...
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Do you no longer have faith? Have your beliefs changed?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I was just made to see reality.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Things are not as immutable as people think. Testing them only harms them.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: One little flaw, one little imperfection, one tiny, little wound, and it's broken beyond repair.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Like the flower you found.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: The flower I'm looking for is no longer here.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: It's almost time for Matins. I should go.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Goodbye, Senior Federico.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Federico Giallo stands alone in the morning light of the sacrarium.
The marks left behind by the flames have already been scrubbed away. Deprived of its furnishings, the sacrarium feels empty, with only the sound of footsteps to fill it.
Federico is an outstanding Executor. He has been with the Notarial Hall for six years, carrying out his duties with excellence.
But this is his first year as a saint. There is no one to guide him or instruct him.
The silent saint picks up the broken and burned flower.
The statue protected it from the flames. It was a miracle that it survived the fire.
But this miracle is worthless in the eyes of another.
The flower is still here.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But it is not the one he wanted?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Wounds beyond repair...
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I don't understand.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Would Laterano still be Laterano?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Insufficient data to reach a conclusion.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Executor Federico realizes with a start—
Clément's expression was too calm.
He did not mention Gerald's death, nor the arrangements of the other Sarkaz.
What about himself?
Words without action have no power. That is why he did not say he would find out the truth.
Nor did he say he would fulfill Gerald's last request.
Federico gazes at the broken flower before his eyes.
He has a feeling—
A feeling that, someday, he will find the answer to all his questions in this flower.
Mm—uh—
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: Morning, Sara... it's time to wake up...
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: Mm... mmm... zzz...
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: Eren! Wake up, Eren!
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Mamma came back yesterday!
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: She came back? Where is she?
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: It must be her! Look—
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: A new blanket from Mamma? It's a little torn...
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: But there are pictures of circles on it! And people with wings! Like what Mamma promised us!
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: Who cares if it's a little torn? Mamma's clothes are torn too. We have to be good.
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: I know, I know.
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: Let's go and find Senior Federico!
attributes.name: Erendel

attributes.content: Can we play with Senior Federico today?
attributes.name: Estara

attributes.content: No, silly, we're going to tell Senior Federico that Mamma came back to see us last night, so he doesn't need to worry!
attributes.name: Erendel
